A B C D G I L M R S U W

A

advanceDirection() - Method in class Car
advances the stored direction of this Car in the following order: right, up, left, down

B

BOTTOM_LINE - Variable in class Court
the bottom line y coordinate

C

Car - Class in <Unnamed>
The Car class models a graphics object on the display it must store: an enum definition integer to manage direction: up, down, left, right whether this Car is selected (or not) a RoundRectangle to display the Car in the window Car dimensions and movement increment a reference back to the A3ButtonWindow
Car(int, int, Color, boolean, A3ButtonWindow, Court) - Constructor for class Car
Constructor for objects of class Car initializes all instance variables of Car class
CAR_HEIGHT - Variable in class Car
the car height
CAR_INCREMENT - Variable in class Car
the car movement increment each time the 'Move' button is pressed
CAR_WIDTH - Variable in class Car
the car width
carA - Variable in class Court
the two car objects
carB - Variable in class Court
the two car objects
court - Variable in class Car
the court where cars are displayed
Court - Class in <Unnamed>
The Court class provides: a window to contain the other graphics objects
Court() - Constructor for class Court
Constructor for objects of class Court that must do the following things: instantiate the window instantiate two cars of different colors - only one of them should be the selected car initialize the text on the 3 buttons repaint the window

D

deSelect() - Method in class Car
sets this Car as NOT selected
direction - Variable in class Car
stores the direction this Car is moving in
DOWN - Static variable in class Car
constant for down direction

G

getOtherCar(Car) - Method in class Court
gets the other Car object used for collision detection

I

isSelected - Variable in class Car
whether this Car is selected
isSelected() - Method in class Car
 

L

LEFT - Static variable in class Car
constant for left direction
leftAction() - Method in class Court
event handler method for the left button it must deselect the current car and select the next car

M

midAction() - Method in class Court
event handler method for the middle button it must advance the direction of the selected car
moveCar() - Method in class Car
moves the selected Car in the direction that is set within its direction variable

R

RIGHT - Static variable in class Car
constant for right direction
rightAction() - Method in class Court
event handler method for the right button it must cause the selected car to move
rrect - Variable in class Car
the graphics object displayed in the window

S

select() - Method in class Car
sets this Car as the selected Car

U

UP - Static variable in class Car
constant for up direction

W

win - Variable in class Car
the window where graphics are displayed
window - Variable in class Court
the window that contains buttons and graphics objects
